body: I wonder what will happen if the walking worm with the girl can't seperate and if she didn't meet anybody to help her instead keeping her as a pet

There was a time where I would search the internet to find the latest issue but after using that walking worm to bring her outside I've become very disappointed in what this has become. Barely anything happens in each chapter, the story is nearly non-existent, the art is basically grade school sketches at this point with no effort in shading. Why don't they write a couple final chapters and give it up, they've beaten this once unique series to death.
The series is only good with the creative bugs. The dogs and pigs are stupid...
I honestly said this is below my expectation.
